Yggdrasil: The name sounds familiar, but I've been stationed for a bit 
on a fringe world, so I might not know her very good. How long has she 
been in stasis lock?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> "Well, you might remember my sister, Lunara - one of the best 
Maximal 
> entertainers there ever was.  She choreographed all her own 
> routines.  I was her assistant - and I still am, or would be if she 
> wasn't in stasis lock because of that energy storm we ran into ..." 
> Jayde trails off, obviously upset over her older sibling's 
condition.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Yggdrasil slightly bent his head and thought.
> > 
> > Yggdrasil: I can't deny that. What did you do before joining the 
> > rogues?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > "I've been on missions before - including solos." she points 
> > > out.  "The fact that I'm still alive and free after all the run-
> ins 
> > > we've had with the law should tell you something."
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > Yggdrasil: I'm not saying you're a rookie, just that rookie 
get 
> > > killed 
> > > > with that attitude. Besides, you won't convince me you're a 
> > > military 
> > > > expert just by saying so. You'll have to prove it.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > > > Jayde sits bolt upright and glares at him.  "ROOKIES?  I've 
> been 
> > > > with 
> > > > > this outfit for almost ten years!"
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > > > Yggdrasil: At least you don't get slagged. I've seen lots 
> of 
> > > > > rookies 
> > > > > > saying the same things you say and getting scrapped at the 
> > > first 
> > > > > > occasion they get. The good thing is it separates those 
who 
> > > should 
> > > > > be 
> > > > > > there from those who shouldn't.
